actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Plus 1d10 poison damage; target grappled (escape DC 13) and restrained; toad can't bite another target.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.description: Swallows a Medium or smaller target it is grappling on a hit; target blinded/restrained with total cover, takes 3d6 acid at start of toad's turns; only one swallowed at once; freed if toad dies.
